channel.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
channel.description: I was Reaper with 1 soul with an alch healing me versus a Hunter, I put off reaping Hunter for a night in case he beared. Was this the correct strategy?

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.source: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
No. It isn’t even the only time an ability interacted with someone who was prevented. Survalence reports who it prevented for example and if they are Unseen.

Read full topic
item.source: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
But if you are prevented from visiting a beared hunter than u didn’t visit him and he can’t kill you lol

Read full topic
item.source: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
I’d believe the patch notes sooner that I would believe the tool tip.

item.source: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Summon a bear to protect you from all attacks at night. The attackers will be dead in the morning (Bypasses night immunity). You will be death and conversion immune.

Says nothing about prevention … Hope a dev can clear this up for me because I’m confused

Read full topic
item.source: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It is very clear that it is Prevention. I see no reason why night immunity piercing should matter.

Read full topic
item.source: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
item.dc:creator: AgentBoin
item.description:
That doesn’t seem right, my situation happened after that patch. So it still is just a prevent against normal attacks, not by pass night immunity.

Read full topic

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Hunter
Bear Companion now prevents all attacks as well as killing the attackers

This was in 1.0.10
It was never changed later

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?

item.description:
If you get healed and attack hunter that bears using some bypass night immunity, you live and hunter dies.

did this when phys healed ass and I used frenzy as enforcer LOL.

item.source: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?

item.title: Will you survive if you attack beared Hunter while getting healed?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The bear bypasses night Immunity. It does not bypass heal. Even if the Alch wasn’t on you the 1 soul would have been enough.

Read full topic
